mybatis-sql-formatter.tabWidth: Number of spaces per indentation level.
mybatis-sql-formatter.useTabs: Use tabs for indentation instead of spaces.
mybatis-sql-formatter.identifierCase: Case transformation for identifiers (tables, columns, etc.).
mybatis-sql-formatter.logicalOperatorNew: Position of logical operators in multi-line statements.
mybatis-sql-formatter.expressionWidth: Maximum width of expressions before wrapping.
mybatis-sql-formatter.linesBetweenQuerie: Number of blank lines between queries.
mybatis-sql-formatter.denseOperators: Use dense operators without spaces around them.
mybatis-sql-formatter.newlineBeforeSemic: Place semicolon on a new line.
